parsetree.*:
<root>[[Category:Scripting_Commands_Arma_3]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of addons ([[CfgPatches]]) in which the given config class is defined. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configSourceAddonList''' config</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_addons = [[configSourceAddonList]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Man");
[[hint]] [[str]] _addons; // ["A3_Data_F","A3_Characters_F","A3_Data_F_Curator","A3_Air_F_Heli"]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[configFile]], [[configSourceMod]], [[configSourceModList]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template></root>
